name: Pipi and Bobo
description:
An asymmetric coop game developed for Mini Jam 48: Teamwork in 72 hours. 

Pipi is a slim blue guy. who is too thin to push anything. Pipi always insists that there is no need to turn left or right, and just stepping forward and backward are enough.

Bobo is a heavy red guy. He is so heavy that he cannot jump like Pipi. However, Bobo has a flexible mind, and he is willing to move in four directions. 

One day they are so bored that they come up with three puzzles to finish, which are trying to overcome difficulties and get to the yellow button basically :D

Control:

  • Pipi: Arrow buttons. 
  • Bobo: W, A, S, D for moving, space for dragging cubes backward. 

Developers: 

  • Programmer & Painter: Okami Wong
  • Programmer: Touma Kazusa
